backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor indicating no backend logic is implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing build-script and documentation updates tied to Android AAB improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend and Android-wrapper file.
frontend/android-wrapper/.gitignore: Git ignore rules excluding build outputs, signing files, and generated Bubblewrap artifacts.
frontend/android-wrapper/bubblewrap.conf: Bubblewrap configuration defining app identity, URLs, icons, signing key info, and Android build settings.
frontend/android-wrapper/keystore.exampl: Template showing required keystore signing fields users must copy and fill for release builds.
frontend/android-wrapper/README.md: Guide for configuring and building the Android TWA wrapper with quick‑start steps and output path info.
frontend/docs/ANDROID_AAB.md: Detailed instructions for configuring, building, signing, verifying, and uploading the Android AAB.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: PWA‑enabled HTML entry point with manifest and icon references for the web app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, start URL, and icon assets.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Script that validates signing config, builds the release AAB, and copies it to a stable output directory.
Script that generates or updates the Bubblewrap TWA project using the config file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring TanStack Router routes for home and order pages within a layout component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, mobile menu sheet, footer, and renders nested routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains placeholder React Query hook demonstrating how to run backend queries using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, fonts, CSS variables, and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero, feature highlights, and a gallery of artworks with modal preview support.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Implements an order form that collects customer details and sends them via WhatsApp upon submission.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and feature list for a two‑page static art website and its Android app packaging plan.
